free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Ex Cathedra, description of real projects and exercises
free_text.Contenu: [br/][li]  Geo-planning and design of underground space: geological considerations and investigations, integrated planning-design process.[br/][br/][li]  Underground construction technologies: conventional and machines tunnelling, pipe-jacking, shaft construction, ground improvement and waterproofing, temporally and permanent supports, instrumentation and monitoring, ventilation, risk assessment, construction management, construction safety.[br/][br/][li]  Tunnel maintenance and refurbishment: long-term deterioration and instability, inspection methods, maintenance and repair, tunnel refurbishment.[br/][br/][li]  Examples of projects: urban underground space and tunnels, mountain tunnels, sub-water tunnels, large rock caverns, tunnel rehabilitation.[br/]
free_text.Forme du contrôle: Continuos examination on the tunnel Project development: written report, plans and final presentation
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: To acquire in-depth knowledge of underground space and underground construction technologies, including planning, construction methods, safety, and environmental considerations.
